headlines.description: — Jalen Hurts shrugged on a TD celebration and did his best to be like Mike.
headlines.shortLinkText: Defending champion Eagles edge Cowboys 24-20 in wild, lightning-delayed NFL season opener

events.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Los Angeles Chargers

headlines.description: Justin Herbert finished off the Los Angeles Chargers' season-opening victory in style, sliding for a first down that effectively ended the game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Herbert outduels Mahomes to help the Chargers beat the Chiefs 27-21 in Brazil

events.name: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at Atlanta Falcons

headlines.description: — Another visit to Mercedes-Benz Stadium produced more lasting memories for Emeka Egbuka.
headlines.shortLinkText: Buccaneers ride 2 TD catches by rookie Egbuka to dramatic 23-20 win over Penix, Falcons
